# Step1: Install R

## Go to CRAN repository <https://cran.rstudio.com/>

![](images/repo.png)

## Click on Download R 

Choose according to your operating system

## Click on install R for the first time

![](images/install_r.png)

## Click on download 

![](images/download.png)

## Go to downloaded folder and open file for installation

![](images/installation.png)

## Follow the default settings and complete installation

On completion, you will be able to see the R Icon on your desktop/ program files

![](images/Rlogo.JPG)
